name: Iron Fist of the Demon King [SUPER short Demo]
name_original: Iron Fist of the Demon King [SUPER short Demo]
description:
In this SUPER early access demo, play as the Demon King in a fantasy land, who has been transformed into a new, weaker form after fighting the Legendary Hero. Now the Demon King must travel the world, recruiting minions to join his army as he seeks not only the keys to his missing power but answers to mysteries. Why was he transformed in such a way? Who is the mastermind of his misfortune? And what will he do to make them pay for these injustices against him. 

Warning: there's a fair bit of swearing cause several of the characters are adults or not very nice people, so be aware when playing cause some of the dialogue can get very....strong.
